com.mijecu25.dsa.algorithms.swap

Class TrivialSwap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mijecu25.dsa.algorithms.swap.Swap
      • com.mijecu25.dsa.algorithms.swap.TrivialSwap

  • public final class TrivialSwap
extends Swap
    Swapping algorithm that trivially swaps elements in an array by using a temporary variable.

    All of the methods run in O(1) time. The helper methods that swap all of the elements of the array run in O(Math.min(array1.length, array2.length) time.

    Runtime: O(1)
    Version:
    0.1.3.10
    Author:
    Miguel Velez - miguelvelezmj25

                            int array1Index,
                            E[] array2,
                            int array2Index)
        Swap the elements of two arrays at the specified positions.
        Type Parameters:
        E - - the type of elements in this array.
        Parameters:
        array1 - - one of the arrays that will have one of its values swapped.
        array1Index - - the index of the first array that will be swapped.
        array2 - - the other array that will have one of its values swapped.
        array2Index - - the index of the second array that will be swapped.

        public static <E> void swap(List<E> list1,
                            int list1Index,
                            List<E> list2,
                            int list2Index)
        Swap the elements of two lists at the specified positions. The run time of this method depends on the implementation of the lists since elements are removed and added in the lists.
        Type Parameters:
        E - - the type of elements in this list.
        Parameters:
        list1 - - one of the lists that will have one of its values swapped.
        list1Index - - the index of the first list that will be swapped.
        list2 - - the other list that will have one of its values swapped.
        list2Index - - the index of the second list that will be swapped.

      • swap

        public static <E> void swap(List<E> list1,
                            List<E> list2)
        Helper method that swaps all the elements of the arrays. The run time of this method depends on the implementation of the lists since elements are removed and added in the lists. It also depends on the length of the shortest list.
        Type Parameters:
        E - - the type of elements in this list.
        Parameters:
        list1 - one array that will have its values swapped.
        list2 - the other array that will have its values swapped.
